verbose_text: To investigate whether EXOdysf can regulate the homeostasis of Ca 2+ flux in DYSF -/- myotubes after laser induced membrane injury, we monitored the level of Ca 2+ change in the cytosol with Fluo-3AM, a fluorescent Ca 2+ probe XREF_BIBR.
evidence: DYSF -/-  myotubes after laser-induced membrane injury
